name.description: The name of the private endpoint connection associated with the Azure resource

properties.description: Resource properties.

AlexaChannelProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the Alexa channel.

isEnabled.description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

BotProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the Bot.

allSettings.description: Contains resource all settings defined as key/value pairs.

appPasswordHint.description: The hint (e.g. keyVault secret resourceId) on how to fetch the app secret

disableLocalAuth.description: Opt-out of local authentication and ensure only MSI and AAD can be used exclusively for authentication.

iconUrl.description: The Icon Url of the bot

isStreamingSupported.description: Whether the bot is streaming supported

msaAppId.description: Microsoft App Id for the bot

msaAppMSIResourceId.description: Microsoft App Managed Identity Resource Id for the bot

msaAppTenantId.description: Microsoft App Tenant Id for the bot

msaAppType.description: Microsoft App Type for the bot

openWithHint.description: The hint to browser (e.g. protocol handler) on how to open the bot for authoring

parameters.description: Contains resource parameters defined as key/value pairs.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether the bot is in an isolated network

schemaTransformationVersion.description: The channel schema transformation version for the bot

storageResourceId.description: The storage resourceId for the bot

tenantId.description: The Tenant Id for the bot

location.description: Specifies the location of the resource.

ConnectionSettingParameter.description: Extra Parameter in a Connection Setting Properties to indicate service provider specific properties

key.description: Key for the Connection Setting Parameter.

value.description: Value associated with the Connection Setting Parameter.

ConnectionSettingProperties.description: Properties for a Connection Setting Item

clientId.description: Client Id associated with the Connection Setting.

clientSecret.description: Client Secret associated with the Connection Setting

parameters.description: Service Provider Parameters associated with the Connection Setting

scopes.description: Scopes associated with the Connection Setting

serviceProviderDisplayName.description: Service Provider Display Name associated with the Connection Setting

serviceProviderId.description: Service Provider Id associated with the Connection Setting

DirectLineChannelProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the Direct Line channel.

DirectLineEmbedCode.description: Direct Line embed code of the resource

sites.description: The list of Direct Line sites

DirectLineSite.description: A site for the Direct Line channel

isBlockUserUploadEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for block user upload.

isDetailedLoggingEnabled.description: Whether this site is disabled detailed logging for

isEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for DirectLine channel

isEndpointParametersEnabled.description: Whether this site is EndpointParameters enabled for channel

isNoStorageEnabled.description: Whether this no-storage site is disabled detailed logging for

isSecureSiteEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for authentication with Bot Framework.

isV1Enabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for Bot Framework V1 protocol.

isV3Enabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for Bot Framework V3 protocol.

isWebChatSpeechEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for Webchat Speech

isWebchatPreviewEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for preview versions of Webchat

trustedOrigins.description: List of Trusted Origin URLs for this site. This field is applicable only if isSecureSiteEnabled is True.

DirectLineSpeechChannelProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the DirectLine Speech channel.

cognitiveServiceRegion.description: The cognitive service region with this channel registration.

cognitiveServiceResourceId.description: The cognitive service id with this channel registration.

cognitiveServiceSubscriptionKey.description: The cognitive service subscription key to use with this channel registration.

isDefaultBotForCogSvcAccount.description: Make this a default bot for chosen cognitive service account.

isEnabled.description: Whether this channel is enabled or not.

EmailChannelProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the Email channel.

authMethod.description: Email channel auth method. 0 Password (Default); 1 Graph.

isEnabled.description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

magicCode.description: The magic code for setting up the modern authentication.

password.description: The password for the email address. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

FacebookChannelProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the Facebook channel.

appSecret.description: Facebook application secret. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isEnabled.description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

FacebookPage.description: A Facebook page for Facebook channel registration

accessToken.description: Facebook application access token. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

apiKey.description: Kik API key. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

isEnabled.description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

isValidated.description: Whether this channel is validated for the bot

LineChannelProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the Line channel.

lineRegistrations.description: The list of line channel registrations

LineRegistration.description: The properties corresponding to a line channel registration

channelAccessToken.description: Access token for the line channel registration

channelSecret.description: Secret for the line channel registration

callingWebhook.description: Webhook for Microsoft Teams channel calls

deploymentEnvironment.description: Deployment environment for Microsoft Teams channel calls

enableCalling.description: Enable calling for Microsoft Teams channel

incomingCallRoute.description: Webhook for Microsoft Teams channel calls

isEnabled.description: Whether this channel is enabled for the bot

privateEndpoint.description: The resource of private end point.

privateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

PrivateLinkServiceConnectionState.description: A collection of information about the state of the connection between service consumer and provider.

actionsRequired.description: A message indicating if changes on the service provider require any updates on the consumer.

description.description: The reason for approval/rejection of the connection.

status.description: Indicates whether the connection has been Approved/Rejected/Removed by the owner of the service.

Sku.description: The SKU of the cognitive services account.

callingWebHook.description: Calling web hook for Skype channel

enableMediaCards.description: Enable media cards for Skype channel

verificationToken.description: The Slack verification token. Value only returned through POST to the action Channel List API, otherwise empty.

TelephonyChannelProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the Direct Line channel.

apiConfigurations.description: The list of Telephony api configuration

defaultLocale.description: The default locale of the channel

phoneNumbers.description: The list of Telephony phone numbers

premiumSKU.description: The premium SKU applied to the channel

TelephonyChannelResourceApiConfiguration.description: A resource Api configuration for the Telephony channel

TelephonyPhoneNumbers.description: A telephone number for the Telephony channel

cognitiveServiceRegion.description: The service region of cognitive service.

cognitiveServiceResourceId.description: The resource id of cognitive service.

cognitiveServiceSubscriptionKey.description: The subscription key of cognitive service.

defaultLocale.description: The default locale of the phone number.

offerType.description: Optional Property that will determine the offering type of the phone.

WebChatChannelProperties.description: The parameters to provide for the Web Chat channel.

sites.description: The list of Web Chat sites

WebChatSite.description: A site for the Webchat channel

isBlockUserUploadEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for block user upload.

isDetailedLoggingEnabled.description: Whether this site is disabled detailed logging for

isEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for DirectLine channel

isEndpointParametersEnabled.description: Whether this site is EndpointParameters enabled for channel

isNoStorageEnabled.description: Whether this no-storage site is disabled detailed logging for

isSecureSiteEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for authentication with Bot Framework.

isV1Enabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for Bot Framework V1 protocol.

isV3Enabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for Bot Framework V3 protocol.

isWebChatSpeechEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for Webchat Speech

isWebchatPreviewEnabled.description: Whether this site is enabled for preview versions of Webchat

trustedOrigins.description: List of Trusted Origin URLs for this site. This field is applicable only if isSecureSiteEnabled is True.
